A smart coat rack with AI-powered organization: This coat rack will have a built-in AI assistant that can recognize and categorize your belongings, such as coats, hats, scarves, and bags. This compartment can be used to store valuable items such as jewelry, money, or important documents. A coat rack with a built-in scale: This coat rack will have a built-in scale that can measure the weight of your belongings. This can be useful for tracking your weight loss or gain over time, or for monitoring the weight of your luggage before a trip. The scale can also be used to weigh your coats and other items to determine which ones are heaviest, making it easier to organize and prioritize your belongings.

This can be especially useful for people who are always on the go and need a convenient place to charge their devices.
